OOC: I shall not give him any breaks! When I was a newcomer and moded left =
and right, as well as I wrote the Sh**iest posts to ever befall mankind, wa=
s I given a break? No, I wasn't. All I heard was "thecode, write sensible p=
osts" and "thecode stop moding it's getting annoying," and it was about a y=
ear later before I started getting respect in the RPG. They were hard on me=
. I officially got kicked out one time. I will not accept any modes what-so=
-ever. One more thing. Justifiable moding? I don't think so! When I tried t=
o do that early in my career, I was almost shown the door. I've come too fa=
r for this moding nonsense. Bah! Oh, and just to show I take board space se=
riously...BELOW:

BIC: Divitri had traveled a long time by now, and she had=
 just stumbled across some dead guy, now. He looked large and fearsome, but=
 he was in so many pieces. After about an hour of digging through the piece=
s of the pile of scrap, she managed to find the right piece and took the me=
mory. It appeared that this guy was an assimilator, someone who stole the s=
parks of other's. His name was Clash, and he lived for millions of years, e=
ven though his life during the war was short. Divitri learned about where C=
lash was before, a base with a much larger bot named Serge. (The base is th=
e Chivtron base.) She decides to go there, and sets that as her destination=
. She starts traveling again...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Pr=
odigey child 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, March 10, 200=
1 1:37 AM
  Subject: funny


  [ok I know I am to post like fights and stuf=
f but I just one to say one thing. I admit I mode. but this new dude Benny.=
 is moding worse then I do. at least  I have some purpose. and what the hel=
l is this crap about him  being an angel and being touched by god. He can n=
ot be hurt. I got to agree with Kev it is pretty funny. but would you all t=
ake it easy on him he is new.
